title: Denali Skies, A Season Girl's Alaskan Odyssey: - An Alaskan Adventure
description: At the age of twenty two, a hussied up bar crawling waitress finds herself walking the line between the call of the wild, and the call of her drinking buddies. Liz transcends through this space that is as limitless and hopeful as her heart. There is no shortage of hippies, tourists, and caribou as our dear waitress negotiates her way through a seasonal job. Romantic, humiliating and heartbreaking, the one constant that keeps her going is the splendor and captivating landscape known as Denali.
author: Danielle Rohr
